root.name: Balls of Fury
root.description: Balls of Fury is based around the semi-popular movie aboout a dethroned ping pong competitor, who must regain his love for the game, and help the FBI infiltrate an illegal, underground, ping pong tournament. To cordinate with the films release, Black Lantern released two different version of the movie based game for the Nintendo DS, and Nintendo Wii. In the game, you follow the Randy, the main character, and his escapades to regain his tittle, and destroy the underground tournament. You face off with upwards of 10 characters, in a ping pong game to the death. The Nintendo DS version of the game was available on September 9th, 2007, while the Wii version became available on September 25th.
